overview: Turtleneck Phantasies is a poem that comes to us in fragments in this video. This work is dedicated to the murmuring, the illegible, the unspeakable, the sketches and doodles, fragments of childhood memories, the absurd moments. In other words, all the little forms that are so central to our relationship with the world, but are given relatively little attention.
title: Turtleneck Phantasies
